short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables the login button on https://calipos.usedirect.com/ when the Peripheral Dynamics Service is not installed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables the login button on https://calipos.usedirect.com/ when the Peripheral Dynamics Service is not installed, so that you can still get in and use the facilities view, etc.
